name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.inmemory.batch-size
description: The batch size when iterating over the database backing the aliasmap

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.

name: ftp.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.image.transfer.chunksize
description:
Chunksize in bytes to upload the checkpoint.
        Chunked streaming is used to avoid internal buffering of contents
        of image file of huge size.
        Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
        in dfs.blocksize.

name: dfs.namenode.write-lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When a write lock is held on the namenode for a long time,
    this will be logged as the lock is released. This sets how long the
    lock must be held for logging to occur.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period
description:
The number of seconds between two periodic checkpoints.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.

name: seq.io.sort.mb
fs.s3a.paging.maximum
description:
How many keys to request from S3 when doing
     directory listings at a time.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.
